name: Starry (GTEKK)
description:
You're a lost star in a foreign world and you go on an adventure through the dark portals.

This game contains 8 levels.

Controls:

Movement: Arrow keys

Dash: Z

We made this game with a group of 4 friends and would love to get your feedback on our first game jam, so feel free to leave a comment :).

Follow us on Twitter if you want to support us and see more similar content in the future: https://twitter.com/GTEKKofficial
